name: Marinated Balsamic Chicken
author: Felicia Manocchio
summary: Chicken breast marinated in Mediterranean spices, then grilled on a cast iron grill pan. It really makes the house smell great.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast, thinly sliced
directions: Combine vinegar, oil, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate for at least 20 minutes
Heat a cast iron grill pan over medium-high heat
Add chicken; cook until golden on the outside, no longer pink in the center, and the juices run clear, 7 to 10 minutes per side
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
